channel.title: Golang on Home on Rails
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on Home on Rails

item.title: Abstracting the logger interface in Go
item.description: Wrote a blog post a few days ago for my company’s blog about our experience of moving from a static logger to an interface and adapter for the go-kit log package. https://blog.cosmos.network/abstracting-the-logger-interface-in-go-4cf96bf90bb7

item.title: CircleCI config for multipackage Golang projects
item.description: Multipackage Golang project - project, consisting of several packages. When testing you usually do something like go test ./..., when getting all the dependencies - go get ./.... There may be or may not be a Go package at the root level. Examples: 1, 2.
